replies.body: These skins are great, riot need to make more of them lmao. I love the small stories too
its nice to get a insight of how jayce players react to any situation thats given to them

Karthus, my love for you just increased ten-fold.

and If you can talk to Bard, imagine what dangerous knowledge the shadow isles must have :p
Well said!

once we were playing D&D with my friends and one of them rolled a d20 to see if he could headbutt the **IRON DOOR DOWN** because he's a troll
and he got a natural 20 so as everyone knows the laws of physics had to change to make him look awesome as he headbutted the door down
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 
a few turns later he jumped down a flight of stone stairs headfirst and got another natural 20

one of our other guys fell down the hole he made

We've got a campaign going on at a moment where our party found a boat and decided to take it along EVERYWHERE we go. We were in open plains, with a chasm that we have to go through with steep hills and and shit, the DM ruled we can't walk up with the boat since it's so heavy and the slopes are steep. One of us realized they have flying, and I have a javelin which lets allies to teleport to whoever I shoot. The guy who can fly is going to fly up, someone is going to have the boat attached them with a rope, and I'm going to throw the javelin at the guy flying to teleport the boat up lmao
Just because you posted it to a league comment doesn't mean i will let it work. THE DM IS WATCHING{{item:3348}}
Please send help DM is scare me

It will work. How it will work is another story. Stock standard humanoid body teleporting a distance while also being tethered you could have 2 main options 1 the rope is cut by the field of the teleport or the PC is cut in half by the rope
Either way I'm not on the rope, ALL IS WELL
{{champion:30}} Looks so cool{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
these skins are awesome but they need to make another rengar skin

ikr they are great

Yay another bloody jayce skin
